# SingleStoreConnection.ClearPool method

Clears the connection pool that *connection* belongs to.

```csharp
public static void ClearPool(SingleStoreConnection connection)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| connection | The [`SingleStoreConnection`](../SingleStoreConnection.md) whose connection pool will be cleared. |
